name: Ultimate Unblock My Car
description:
Ultimate Unblock My Car is a simple puzzle game. In this game you have to move other cars away and move the red car to the exit. Vertical cars can move only up and down. Horizontal cars can move only left and right.
There are 4 difficult levels of the game, from Easy to Expert , 2000 levels in total , the challenge awaits you!
Unblock your car! It's indeed a super fun game for brain training! Come on, unblock me!

Features:
* 4 difficult levels of the game, from Easy to Expert.
* 2000 levels in total.
* Rate stars based on your moves.
* Multi-language supported for English and Chinese.
